# Slime People
They breathe nitrogen instead of oxygen, which is abundant in the station air, but harder to find compressed into gas tanks. They exhale nitrous oxide and are unaffected by it. Their body can process 6 reagents at the same time instead of just 2.
They take [color=#1e90ff]80% less Cellular damage, 40% less Blunt damage and 20% less Poison damage[/color], but [color=#ffa500]50% more Cold damage, 20% more Slash damage and 20% more Piercing damage[/color].
